201003.n: History and Aesthetics of Electroacoustic Music

201103.n: History and Aesthetics of Electroacoustic Music

201203.n: History and Aesthetics of Electroacoustic Music

catList: After its practical emergence in the late 1940's, electroacoustic music became an integral part of 20th and 21st century music history. This course explores the aesthetical, ideological and technical evolution of electroacoustic music in historical context. It aims to investigate the sound processing techniques, and in order to establish a critical listening perspective, which can be considered as a fundamental element for the perception of electroacoustic compositions.
